result.eng: Can I can drop in to you in the afternoon?

result.eng: Would you like to meet tomorrow?

result.orig: Ar mhaith leat bualadh le chéile amárach
result.html: Ar mhaith leat bualadh le chéile amárachWould you like to meet tomorrow?

result.eng: Would you like to have sex with me?

result.eng: I got the idea while getting up in the morning.

result.ponchtml: Ḃuail an smaoineaṁ mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.

result.eng: We met each other in Paris.

result.orig: Bhuail muid le chéile i bPáras
result.html: Bhuail muid le chéile i bPárasWe met each other in Paris.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail muid le ċéile i bPárasWe met each other in Paris.

result.eng: I met him while I was in Galway.
result.ga: Bhuail mé leis agus mé i nGaillimh
result.orig: Bhuail mé leis agus mé i nGaillimh

result.ponchtml: Ḃuail mé leis agus mé i nGailliṁI met him while I was in Galway.

result.eng: I met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.
result.ga: Bhuail mé leis an Taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an Uachtarán chomh maith
result.orig: Bhuail mé leis an Taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an Uachtarán chomh maith

result.eng: I met her in the street.
result.ga: Bhuail mé léi ar an tsráid

result.html: Bhuail mé léi ar an tsráidI met her in the street.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail mé léi ar an tsráidI met her in the street.

result.eng: They ran into me on the road.

result.html: Bhuail siad umam ar an bhótharThey ran into me on the road.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail siad umam ar an ḃóṫarThey ran into me on the road.

result.eng: He threw on his uniform and left.

result.html: Bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imighHe threw on his uniform and left.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail sé a éide uime agus d'imiġHe threw on his uniform and left.

result.eng: He hit me.

result.orig: Bhuail sé mé
result.html: Bhuail sé méHe hit me.

result.eng: He got a heart attack.

result.ponchtml: Ḃuail taom croí éHe got a heart attack.

result.eng: It was very strange meeting my father for the first time.

result.eng: Hit the ball!

result.html: Buail an liathróidHit the ball!
result.ponchtml: Buail an liaṫróidHit the ball!

result.eng: I'll meet you at the airport.

result.eng: You'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.

result.eng: I have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.

result.eng: The pilot was hit in the head but the airplane landed safely.

result.orig: Buaileadh an píolóta sa chloigeann ach thuirling an t-eitleán slán sábhailte

result.eng: The crowd started yelling and clapping.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna

result.eng: If I met them, though, I don't remember it.

result.eng: I never met a more slippery person.

result.eng: They would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ga: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu

result.eng: After they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.

result.eng: She was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.

result.eng: He put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
